Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Interp::inter_tp

Determines the meaning of the input +/- points in the EDEIprocess::mpinter.

Enumerator:
ALPHA 

Angle (x-axis).

NUMBER 

Number of the string in the read RCstaff::RCoption() "RC" file.

REFLECT 

Reflectivity (y-axis).

INTENS 

Intensity (y-axis).
